author: cbs8
title: Crazy Finger Joy: JXD S192 Powered by Nvidia K1 192-core GPU, Nvidia Shield Protable 2?
text:
JXD S192 is the world's first base on Nvidia k1 chipest portable video game consoles.
 BELLEVUE, WA, October 20, S192 is coming
JXD S192 is the world's first base on Nvidia k1 chipest portable video game consoles. 7 inches game console JXD S192 will be released when famous company JXD from China cooperated with NVIDIA. This new product is features by NVIDIA Tegra K1 processor, Unique Design, exclusive top PC games, long standby time and true sound representation.
The reason why you choose S192
It's time to get yourself an upgraded console. For most masterpiece fans, it's hard to get the game experience on the ordinary smart phone exactly the same with on PC, Xbox One, PS4, Wii and PSP when playing games, while the traditional game console is too expensive. Looking for a high quality & reasonable price hand-held game console is a dream for fans. Now, dream comes true. Good news for all game fans, JXD cooperated with NVIDIA based on mutual benefit, bring you the perfect portable game console - S192.
Excellent Chip
JXD Singularity S192 applies NVIDIA Tegra K1 processor. Advanced Quad-core Cortex-A15 technology which supports powerful performance and ultra long battery life. S192 uses 2.0GHz processor, it gets faster speed. 192 core Graphics GPU gets perfect effect on vision easier.
Excellent Retina Display
Perfect visual experience & 7.0 inches full HD Retina display
S192 uses 7.0 inch 1920*1200 pixels screen, makes perfect visual experience whatever browse websites, playing games, watch movies or see pictures. PPI pixel density up to 336, much higher than the 228 PPI of the Sony PSV, this means that you are unable to identify the single physical pixels just by naked eye.
Excellent Battery
10000mAh Super Battery, Bigger than the top one.
Using LG / ATL lithium-ion polymer battery, which capacity up to 10000mAh, Quick charger compatible with 5V 2A.
Top Tablet PC Battery Comparison: iPad air 8756mAh, Mi Pad 6700mAh, NVIDIA Shield Tablet 5600mAh
Excellent Audio
High-fidelity stereo dual speakers, with S192 independent audio design, 50 external cavity playback, fence design, renders game music in stunning detail for clearer and deeper bass. Playing game is dynamic and alive, player will stay in the moment, immersed in the game.
Excellent Camera
Rear 13MP/ Front 5MP camera, Wi-Fi compatible with 5G and 2.4G, also supports Buletooth 4.0.
Excellent Games
ANDROID -a revolutionary gaming experience &Top exclusive game + Android's special game
NVIDIA as the world's leading graphics company cooperated with the mainstream game development company, discover tailor-made large-scale games based on the optimization and testing of the TOP100 game in the world according to the S192's NVIDIA processor. You can get these S192 "exclusive games" free or paid from the Google Play Store.
Design For Game Player
Exclusive features: Android button mapping can be manipulated through the real keys, button adaptation scheme open to player fully, creating their own suitable keys easily. Accurate measurement of operating buttons and layout grip curve, bring fantasy touch.
Excellent Handfeel
Marvel at how good the smooth surface feels against your palm.
when S192 in your grip, palm and finger joints in place aptly handle, arrow keys, function keys, L/R keys and joysticks, "Tailor-made" feeling come out, when you are in the fierce fighting game, the nerve distributed in the "thumb", "ring", "palm" tells you what is professional Craftsmanship.
Official page : http://www.jxd.hk/game-console/s192/
Official Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/JXDofficial
JXD was approved to establish by Shenzhen Administration in 1995, with the R&D and manufacturer located in Shenzhen, China. We are an affiliated company and wholly owned subsidiary of Headquarters as Hong Kong JXD CO., LTD.
